name: Third Person Shooter
description:
This is a prototype of a Third-Person Shooter Game for exploring how more advanced movement systems work and how games handle weapon recoil. 

Although this build contains multiplayer, it is not recommended since you will need to setup port forwarding of Port 7777 on your router. 

For Single Player: 

  • Launch the Executable and click on Host

If you want to try multiplayer steps:

  • Setup Port Forwarding for Port 7777
  • Launch the Executable and click on Host
  • Share your Public IP with the people you want to play with and have them click on Join

More details on how mechanics work can be found on the DevLog: https://rud156.itch.io/tps/devlog

The Source Code can be found at https://github.com/Rud156/ThirdPersonShooter
